name: Beat the Odds (polkoii, peachyyjae, JoshTheStriker, royalcookiex, Villeloso)
name_original: Beat the Odds (polkoii, peachyyjae, JoshTheStriker, royalcookiex, Villeloso)
description:
(In Development)

Beat The Odds is a 3D FPS Dungeon Crawler where the player shoots various projectiles based on the value of the dice roll they get in their gun every reload. Defeat all enemies on each floor to progress. Get the lowest time possible while killing enemies to reduce your time.
